concept.title: Use Polar Tracking and Object Snap Tracking
concept.shortdesc: Auto tracking includes polar tracking and object snap tracking. You can turn them on and off by repressing POLAR and OTRACK button on the Status Bar.

conbody.p: When the polar tracking mode is on, the cursor moves along the specified angle. When the object snap tracking is on, the cursor moves along an alignment path based on the snap point.
